CHAT.comment: DEBORIS CALCANO-MARTINEZ, ET AL., Petitioners v. IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:17 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LUCAS GUTTENTAG ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF EDWIN S. KNEEDLER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF LUCAS GUTTENTAG ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:17 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
